name: The Trials - A Minecraft Quest
description: This is the most important day of your life. It is a tradition among your people that for young women and men must to do "The trials" at the age of seventeen. An intricate maze to test your exploration skills; a tough battle to prove that you are not an easy prey for unknown creatures; and a dangerous track to test your agility await you. If you overcome these obstacles, you will become an Explorer, the noblest and dangerous way of life in your town.
